tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bicycle_warranty_information (
  warranty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  warranty_period INT,
  warranty_terms TEXT,
  registration_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE registration_details (
    registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    bicycle_model VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE bicycle_information (
  bicycle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bicycle_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  warranty_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (warranty_id) REFERENCES warranty_information(warranty_id)
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_registration (
    registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    customer_email TEXT,
    registration_date DATE,
    bike_serial_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_details (
    warranty_id INT,
    term_id INT,
    registration_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (warranty_id) REFERENCES warranty_periods(warranty_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (term_id) REFERENCES warranty_terms(term_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (registration_id) REFERENCES warranty_registration(registration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_registration (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  registration_id INT,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customer_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  registration_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE bicycle_information (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  bicycle_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  brand VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  model_year INT NOT NULL,
  color VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_bicycle (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  bicycle_id INT,
  warranty_period_id INT,
  warranty_term_id INT,
  registration_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (bicycle_id) REFERENCES bicycle_information(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (warranty_period_id) REFERENCES warranty_periods(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (warranty_term_id) REFERENCES warranty_terms(term_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (registration_id) REFERENCES warranty_registration(registration_id)
);
